title: Samsung officially kills the Galaxy Note
content:
It’s been quite obvious for the better part of two years now that Samsung is killing the Galaxy Note name, but the company has officially put the final nail in the coffin, fully confirming that the iconic brand is dead.

more…

The post Samsung officially kills the Galaxy Note appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has officially killed its iconic Galaxy Note brand, explicitly confirming the Galaxy S "Ultra" will replace it going forward.
